name: Concrete Evolution
description:
Concrete Evolution

Experience life from a different point of view, and try to adapt and survive.

This Piece was  created to examine how I could create a game that represents or looks at some of the challenges faced by animals in how they adapt to growing human environments and urbanisation. And was inspired by a national geographic article (Dell’Amore 2016), which presents evidence and information regarding the adaption of some species in city and urban environments in the USA. Two prominent studies expressed during the article are the adaption of both wily coyotes

Process

A week by week process of experimenting with unity to create the game.
